verses.text: Blessed \w is|strong="H1732"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* who considers \w the|strong="H1732"\w* poor. \w The|strong="H1732"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* will deliver \w him|strong="H1732"\w* \w in|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H1732"\w* day \w of|strong="H4210"\w* evil.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w preserve|strong="H4422"\w* \w him|strong="H4422"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* keep \w him|strong="H4422"\w* alive. \w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* blessed \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H7451"\w* surrender \w him|strong="H4422"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* enemies.

\w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* sustain \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* sickbed, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* restore \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* bed \w of|strong="H3068"\w* illness.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* said, “\w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*! \w Heal|strong="H2015"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* sinned \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*.”

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* enemies speak evil \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*: “\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* die, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* name perish?”

If \w he|strong="H8034"\w* comes \w to|strong="H4191"\w* see \w me|strong="H4191"\w*, \w he|strong="H8034"\w* speaks falsehood. \w His|strong="H4191"\w* heart gathers iniquity \w to|strong="H4191"\w* itself. \w When|strong="H4970"\w* \w he|strong="H8034"\w* goes abroad, \w he|strong="H8034"\w* tells \w it|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w All|strong="H7200"\w* \w who|strong="H7723"\w* hate \w me|strong="H7200"\w* whisper \w together|strong="H6908"\w* \w against|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*. \w They|strong="H2351"\w* imagine \w the|strong="H7200"\w* worst \w for|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w*.

“\w An|strong="H2803"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* disease”, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* say, “\w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w afflicted|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* lies \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H7451"\w* rise \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H5921"\w*.”

Yes, \w my|strong="H6965"\w* own familiar friend, \w in|strong="H1697"\w* whom \w I|strong="H1697"\w* trusted, \w who|strong="H3808"\w* ate bread \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w me|strong="H3254"\w*, \w has|strong="H1697"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* heel \w against|strong="H6965"\w* \w me|strong="H3254"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1571"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w have|strong="H1571"\w* mercy \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* raise \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H1431"\w*, \w that|strong="H3899"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H1571"\w* repay \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w By|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6965"\w* know \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6965"\w* delight \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*, \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* enemy doesn’t triumph \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H2603"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* uphold \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* integrity, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* set \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w presence|strong="H5921"\w* forever.

Blessed \w be|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* God \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Israel, \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*! Amen \w and|strong="H5769"\w* amen.
